description:
ABOUT
•	Maintaining your allergy information that can help you and your doctor control allergy and its many complications.
•	The Allergy Tracker simplifies allergy data logging.
•	This app will allow you to enter the multiple allergy logs at different times of a day.
•	 This app saves the Name, Date and time, Reaction and note.
•	This app will allow you to search logs by note.
•	Very easy to use.

  Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Oversized numbers for easy data entry.
•	This app will allows you to send logs to doctor. 
•	Very simple and easy to use.
